caption:
This photograph features a circular, white, hand-painted sign mounted on a dark post. The sign has irregular edges and shows signs of weathering with chips and scratches visible, revealing its exposure to elements. It bears the hand-painted black text "NO TRESPES PRIVET PROPERTY NO FISHING ALLOW KEEP OUT". The text has misspellings and untraditional abbreviation, which suggest a non-formal effort probably made by a private individual rather than an official entity.

The background of the sign is slightly blurred and features a natural, outdoor setting, likely a sandy terrain with footprints scattered throughout, indicating frequent activity or traffic in the area. The lighting in the photograph is bright, suggesting it was taken during daylight and provides a crisp detail to the forefront – the sign – while softly fading out the details of the sandy background.
title: Sign along the Colorado River--misspelled but clear
